name: A Skatepark(?)
description:
A Skatepark(?) is a randomly generated skatepark simulator that asks the player the question: Is it a skatepark?

Skateparks are often designed by non-skaters, concrete contractors, and city officials. The task of building a skatepark is rarely given to those who deserve it most: the skaters. This game is a critique on that process, inspired by the local skatepark here in Davis, California. 

Explore the levels and generate a new skatepark by touching a cube

Press R to reset to the loading level

Press Q to quit the game

Then ask yourself if it is indeed a skatepark
